name: Age of Awakening
description:
This is an experimental, visual novel I created over the course of a month. The plan was to do a visual novel recapping some of the events of a D&D campaign I'm playing in. This particular installment explains my character's backstory and introduces a few other characters. Overall it should last about 20-30 minutes. If this is well received, I'd like to do short stories about all of the other characters. They can been seen on the temporary title screen.

This was only my second time using Ren'py and it's my first time using it properly for what it's intended and it was a much smoother experience overall. I am still learning though so please critique and if you enjoy it let me know so I know to do more.
